title: 'The Perfect Partnership' | Feat. Joshua Johnson and Sam Sanders
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Being a good partner is all about give and take. But in today’s story, Sam Sanders (NPR) and Joshua Johnson (WAMU) co-star in a Ghanaian story about one man who's far more interested in the taking.
